statements: DELETE FROM network_outages WHERE severity = 'HIGH' AND location = 'Data Center A';
DELETE FROM network_outages WHERE location = 'New York' AND severity = 'HIGH';
DELETE FROM network_failures WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND failure_type = 'Connectivity Issue';
DELETE FROM network_failures WHERE failure_type = 'Hardware Failure';
DELETE FROM network_outages WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' AND outage_reason = 'Power Failure';
DELETE FROM network_failures WHERE failure_type = 'Hardware Failure' AND failure_time < '2021-12-01';
DELETE FROM network_outages WHERE outage_id = 101 AND affected_network = 'Data Center A';
DELETE FROM resolution_actions WHERE action_id = 205 AND action_type = 'Troubleshooting';
